name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UTM URL Generator | Campaign URL Builder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you to build UTM Urls in click of Button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✅ UTM URL Generator 🌐

✅ Simple Chrome Extension for creating UTM URLs Quickly

🔖 What is UTM URL?

- A UTM code is a snippet of simple code that you can add to the end of a URL to track the performance of campaigns and content.

📝 Requirements 

- Current Page URL
- Campaign Details

💅 Features 

- Quick launch with Ctrl + Q 
- Displays QR Code
- Auto fetching Current Tab URL
- Auto Copy to Clipboard
- Built using Pure.CSS
- Light Weight

✅ LICENSE : MIT
